trans-unit.source: This guide shows how to set up your SDK environment to deploy Cordova apps for Android devices, and how to optionally use Android-centered command-line tools in your development workflow. You need to install the Android SDK regardless of whether you want to use these platform-centered shell tools or cross-platform Cordova CLI for development. For a comparison of the two development paths, see the Overview. For details on the CLI, see Cordova CLI Reference.
trans-unit.target: 本指南说明了如何设置SDK环境以为Android设备部署Cordova应用程序，以及如何在开发工作流程中有选择地使用以Android为中心的命令行工具。无论您是要使用这些以平台为中心的外壳工具还是跨平台的Cordova CLI进行开发，都需要安装Android SDK。有关两种开发路径的比较，请参见概述。有关CLI的详细信息，请参阅《Cordova CLI参考》。

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to create a JS/HTML Cordova application and deploy them to various native mobile platforms using the cordova command-line interface (CLI). For detailed reference on Cordova command-line, review the CLI reference
trans-unit.target: 本指南向您展示如何创建JS / HTML Cordova应用程序，以及如何使用 cordova 命令行界面（CLI）将它们部署到各种本机移动平台。有关Cordova命令行的详细参考，请查看CLI参考。

trans-unit.source: This has particularly been an issue with the File-Transfer plugin, which previously used device-absolute-paths (and can still accept them). It has been updated to work correctly with FileSystem URLs, so replacing entry.fullPath with entry.toURL() should resolve any issues getting that plugin to work with files on the device.
trans-unit.target: 尤其是File-Transfer插件存在问题，该插件以前使用device-absolute-paths（并且仍然可以接受它们）。它已被更新，以正确地与文件系统的URL工作，所以更换 entry.fullPath 与 entry.toURL() 应该可以解决得到该插件工作与设备上的文件的任何问题。

trans-unit.source: This is any git reference understood by git checkout: a branch or tag name (e.g., master, 0.3.1), or a commit hash (e.g., 975ddb228af811dd8bb37ed1dfd092a3d05295f9).
trans-unit.target: 这是 git checkout 可以理解的任何git参考：分支或标记名称（例如 master ， 0.3.1 ）或提交哈希（例如 975ddb228af811dd8bb37ed1dfd092a3d05295f9 ）。

trans-unit.source: This is for people still using windows8 platform to upgrade from older versions of Cordova. Most of these instructions apply to projects created with an older set of command-line tools that precede the cordova CLI utility. See The Command-Line Interface for information how to update the version of the CLI.
trans-unit.target: 这适用于仍使用 windows8 平台从较旧版本的Cordova升级的用户。这些说明中的大多数适用于使用 cordova CLI实用程序之前的一组较旧的命令行工具创建的项目。有关如何更新CLI版本的信息，请参见命令行界面。

trans-unit.source: This is like <source-file> element but specifically for platforms such as iOS and Android that distinguish between source files, headers, and resources. This is not supported by Windows.
trans-unit.target: 这类似于 <source-file> 元素，但专门用于区分源文件，标头和资源的iOS和Android等平台。Windows不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: This is like <source-file> element, but specifically for platforms such as iOS and Android that distinguish between source files, headers, and resources.

trans-unit.source: This is the default setting for a new Xcode install, but it may be set differently following an upgrade from an older version of Xcode.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个新的Xcode安装的默认设置,但从旧版本的Xcode升级后可能会有不同的设置。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value for newly created CLI projects.
trans-unit.target: 这是新创建的CLI项目的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This is the part where your application code resides. The application itself is implemented as a web page, by default a local file named index.html, that references CSS, JavaScript, images, media files, or other resources are necessary for it to run. The app executes in a WebView within the native application wrapper, which you distribute to app stores.
trans-unit.target: 这是您的应用程序代码所在的部分。该应用程序本身以网页的形式实现，默认情况下，名为index.html的本地文件运行该文件时必须引用CSS，JavaScript，图像，媒体文件或其他资源。该应用程序在本机应用程序包装内的WebView中执行，然后将其分发到应用程序商店。

trans-unit.source: This marshals a request from the UIWebView to the iOS native side, effectively calling the action method on the service class, with the arguments passed in the args array.
trans-unit.target: 这封送了从 UIWebView 到iOS本机端的请求，并使用 args 数组中传递的参数有效地调用了 service 类上的 action 方法。

trans-unit.source: This marshals a request from the WebView to the Android native side, effectively calling the action method on the service class, with additional arguments passed in the args array.
trans-unit.target: 这封送了从WebView到Android本机端的请求，有效地调用了 service 类上的 action 方法，并在 args 数组中传递了其他参数。

trans-unit.source: This plugin defines a global Media Constructor.

trans-unit.source: This plugin defines a global device object, which describes the device's hardware and software. Although the object is in the global scope, it is not available until after the deviceready event.
trans-unit.target: 该插件定义了一个全局 device 对象，该对象描述了设备的硬件和软件。尽管对象在全局范围内，但是直到 deviceready 事件之后该对象才可用。

trans-unit.source: This plugin defines a global navigator.camera object, which provides an API for taking pictures and for choosing images from the system's image library.
trans-unit.target: 该插件定义了一个全局的 navigator.camera 对象，该对象提供了一个用于拍照和从系统图像库中选择图像的API。

该插件定义全局 StatusBar 对象。
该插件定义了全局 cordova.file 对象。
该插件定义了全局 navigator.device.capture 对象。

trans-unit.source: This plugin defines global objects including navigator.vibrate.
trans-unit.target: 该插件定义了包括 navigator.vibrate 的全局对象。

trans-unit.source: This plugin implements a File API allowing read/write access to files residing on the device.
trans-unit.target: 该插件实现了一个文件API,允许对驻留在设备上的文件进行读写访问。

trans-unit.source: This plugin implements a whitelist policy for navigating the application webview on Cordova 4.0
trans-unit.target: 该插件实现了在Cordova 4.0上导航应用程序webview的白名单策略。

trans-unit.target: 此插件是使用闪屏时需要的。这个插件可以在应用程序启动时显示和隐藏闪屏。

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides a way to vibrate the device.
trans-unit.target: 这个插件提供了一种震动设备的方式。

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides a web browser view that displays when calling cordova.InAppBrowser.open().
trans-unit.target: 该插件提供了一个Web浏览器视图，该视图在调用 cordova.InAppBrowser.open() 时显示。

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides access to the device's audio, image, and video capture capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 该插件提供了对设备的音频、图像和视频捕捉功能的访问。

trans-unit.target: 这个插件提供了设备的位置信息,如纬度和经度。

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides the ability to record and play back audio files on a device.
trans-unit.target: 这个插件提供了在设备上录制和播放音频文件的能力。

trans-unit.target: 此插件提供与以前版本相同的白名单行为。参见cordova-plugin-legacy-whitelist

trans-unit.source: This preference sets the corresponding flag in your app manifest. Plugins should do the work necessary to configure the appearance of the displayed notifications.
trans-unit.target: 该首选项在您的应用程序清单中设置相应的标志。插件应该做必要的工作来配置显示通知的外观。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the deceleration speed of momentum scrolling. normal is the default speed for most native apps, and fast is the default for Mobile Safari.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制了动量滚动的减速速度。正常是大多数本地应用程序的默认速度,而快速是 Mobile Safari 的默认速度。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether content in the web view is broken up into pages that fill the view one screen at a time,or shown as one long scrolling view. If set to a paginated form, this property toggles a paginated layout on the content, causing the web view to use the values of PageLength and GapBetweenPages to relayout its content.
trans-unit.target: 此属性决定了 Web 视图中的内容是被分割成一个个页面来填充视图,还是显示为一个长滚动视图。如果设置为分页形式,该属性会在内容上切换分页布局,使Web视图使用PageLength和GapBetweenPages的值来重述其内容。

trans-unit.source: This property maps directly to TARGETEDDEVICEFAMILY in the xcode project. Note that if you target universal (which is the default) you will need to supply screen shots for both iPhone and iPad or your app may be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 此属性直接映射到xcode项目中的TARGETED DEVICE FAMILY。请注意，如果您针对通用（默认设置），则需要同时提供iPhone和iPad的屏幕截图，否则您的应用可能会被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: This property offers a fast way to determine the device's network connection state, and type of connection.
trans-unit.target: 该属性提供了一种快速确定设备的网络连接状态和连接类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the MinTargetVersion for the Windows UAP. If not specified, this is set to the initial release version 10.0.10240.0
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置了 Windows UAP 的 MinTargetVersion,如果没有指定,则设置为初始版本 10.0.10240.0。如果未指定,则设置为初始发布版本 10.0.10240.0。

trans-unit.source: This requests the permissions specified in the array. It's a good idea to provide a publicly accessible permissions array since this can be used by plugins that use your plugin as a dependency, although this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 这将请求数组中指定的权限。提供一个可公开访问的权限数组是个好主意,因为这可以被使用你的插件作为依赖的插件使用,尽管这不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates Cordova hooks usage to trace to the console output the size of generated .apk file for Android platform.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了Cordova钩子的使用,以跟踪Android平台生成的.apk文件的大小到控制台输出。

trans-unit.source: This section details the Plugman utility. For more information on consuming Plugman as a node module or modifying the source code, see the README file in its repository.
trans-unit.target: 本节详细介绍Plugman实用程序。有关将Plugman用作节点模块或修改源代码的更多信息，请参见其资源库中的README文件。

trans-unit.source: This section is not written yet.

This section provides details for how to implement a plugin for use in a Windows Store app for Windows 8.1 phone and desktop, and Universal Windows Platform (Windows 10+). Before reading this, see Create your first plugin for an overview of the plugin's structure and its common JavaScript interface. This section continues to demonstrate the sample echo plugin that communicates from the Cordova webview to the native platform and back.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供有关如何实现在Windows 8.1手机和台式机以及通用Windows平台（Windows 10+）的Windows应用商店应用中使用的插件的详细信息。在阅读本文之前，请参阅创建您的第一个插件，以获取该插件的结构及其通用JavaScript接口的概述。本节将继续演示示例回声插件，该插件将从Cordova Webview到本机平台进行通信。

trans-unit.source: This section provides details for how to implement native plugin code on the Android platform. Before reading this, see the Plugin Development Guide for an overview of the plugin's structure and its common JavaScript interface. This section continues to demonstrate the sample echo plugin that communicates from the Cordova webview to the native platform and back. For another sample, see also the comments in CordovaPlugin.java.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供有关如何在Android平台上实现本机插件代码的详细信息。在阅读本文之前，请参阅《插件开发指南》以获取插件结构及其通用JavaScript接口的概述。本节将继续演示示例回声插件，该插件将从Cordova Webview到本机平台进行通信。有关另一个示例，另请参见CordovaPlugin.java中的注释。

trans-unit.source: This section provides details for how to implement native plugin code on the iOS platform. Before reading this, see [Plugin Development Guide][plugin-dev] for an overview of the plugin's structure and its common JavaScript interface. This section continues to demonstrate the sample echo plugin that communicates from the Cordova webview to the native platform and back.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供有关如何在iOS平台上实现本机插件代码的详细信息。在阅读本文之前，请参阅[插件开发指南] [plugin-dev]，以获取插件结构及其通用JavaScript接口的概述。本节将继续演示示例回声插件，该插件将从Cordova Webview到本机平台进行通信。

trans-unit.source: This section shows how to configure an application's icon for various platforms. Documentation about splash screen images can be found in the Cordova-Plugin-Splashscreen documentation Splashscreen plugin docs.
trans-unit.target: 本节说明如何为各种平台配置应用程序的图标。可以在Cordova-Plugin-Splashscreen文档Splashscreen插件docs中找到有关初始屏幕图像的文档。

trans-unit.source: This section steps through a simple echo plugin that passes a string from JavaScript to the native platform and back, one that you can use as a model to build far more complex features. This section discusses the basic plugin structure and the outward-facing JavaScript interface. For each corresponding native interface, see the list at the end of this section.
trans-unit.target: 本节逐步介绍一个简单的echo插件，该插件将一个字符串从JavaScript传递到本机平台，然后传递回该平台，您可以将其用作模型以构建更复杂的功能。本节讨论基本的插件结构和面向外部的JavaScript接口。对于每个对应的本机接口，请参阅本节末尾的列表。

trans-unit.source: This sets the IPHONEOSDEPLOYMENTTARGET in the build, which ultimately translates to the MinimumOSVersion in the ipa. For more details please refer to Apple's documentation on Deployment Target Settings
trans-unit.target: 这将在构建中设置IPHONEOS 部署目标，最终将其转换为ipa中的MinimumOSVersion。有关更多详细信息，请参阅Apple的“部署目标设置”文档

trans-unit.source: This sets the WebView engine plugin to be used to render the host app. The plugin must conform to the CDVWebViewEngineProtocol protocol. The 'value' here should match the 'feature' name of the WebView engine plugin that is installed. This preference usually would be set by the WebView engine plugin that is installed, automatically.
trans-unit.target: 这设置了用于渲染主机应用程序的WebView引擎插件。该插件必须符合CDVWebViewEngineProtocol协议。这里的 "值 "应该与安装的WebView引擎插件的 "特征 "名称相匹配。这个首选项通常会由安装的WebView引擎插件自动设置。

trans-unit.source: This tag installs resource files into your platform, and is similar to the same tag in plugin.xml. This tag is currently only supported on cordova-ios@4.4.0 or greater and cordova-android@6.2.1 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 此标记将资源文件安装到您的平台中，类似于plugin.xml中的相同标记。当前仅在 cordova-ios@4.4.0 或更高版本以及 cordova-android@6.2.1 或更高版本上支持此标签。

trans-unit.target: 此白名单不适用于插件，仅适用于超链接和对 window.open() 的调用。

trans-unit.source: To build and run apps, you need to install SDKs for each platform you wish to target. Alternatively, if you are using browser for development you can use browser platform which does not require any platform SDKs.

trans-unit.source: To get smaller images, you can return a resized image by passing both targetHeight and targetWidth values with your CameraOptions object. In this example, you resize the returned image to fit in a 100px by 100px box (the aspect ratio is maintained, so 100px is either the height or width, whichever is greater in the source).
trans-unit.target: 要获取较小的图像，您可以通过将cameraOptions对象传递 targetHeight 和 targetWidth 值来返回调整大小的图像。在此示例中，您将调整返回图像的大小以适合100px x 100px的框（保持宽高比，因此100px为高度或宽度，以源中较大者为准）。

trans-unit.source: To indicate support for a particular platform, add a keyword in the format **cordova-<platformName>** to the list of keywords in package.json. trans-unit.target: 为了表示对特定平台的支持，请将 **cordova-<platformName>** 格式的关键字添加到package.json中的关键字列表中。Plugman的 createpackagejson 命令为您执行此操作，但是如果不使用它来生成 package.json ，则应如下所示手动对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: To inspect, simply open up the URL chrome://inspect in Chrome on your desktop. Here you will see a list of connected devices and inspectable apps. Your device must be set up for USB debugging for this to work. Full instructions on getting set up can be found at https://developers.google.com/chrome/mobile/docs/debugging.
trans-unit.target: 要进行检查，只需在台式机上的Chrome中打开URL chrome://inspect 。在这里，您将看到已连接设备和可检查应用程序的列表。您的设备必须设置为USB调试才能正常工作。有关设置的完整说明，请访问https://developers.google.com/chrome/mobile/docs/debugging。

trans-unit.source: Type the Option-Command-1 key combination to show the File Inspector.

Type the Option-Command-A key combination, which should drop down a sheet to add files to your project (the Add Files... sheet). Make sure the Created groups for any added folders radio button is selected.

trans-unit.source: Until Cordova 2.3.0, the Connection object was accessed via navigator.network.connection, after which it was changed to navigator.connection to match the W3C specification. It's still available at its original location, but is deprecated and will eventually be removed.
trans-unit.target: 在Cordova 2.3.0之前，可通过 navigator.network.connection 访问 Connection 对象，之后将其更改为 navigator.connection 以匹配W3C规范。它仍然可以在其原始位置使用，但已过时，最终将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Use a simple color wash. If you use two colors, you'll want one color to fill the top half of the image, and the second to fill the bottom half. If you use a gradient, you'll probably want to ensure that the middle of the gradient lines up with the center of the image.

trans-unit.source: Use the InAppBrowser when opening links to any outside website. This is much safer than whitelisting a domain name and including the content directly in your application because the InAppBrowser will use the native browser's security features and will not give the website access to your Cordova environment. Even if you trust the third party website and include it directly in your application, that third party website could link to malicious web content.
trans-unit.target: 当打开任何外部网站的链接时,请使用InAppBrowser。这比将域名列入白名单并将内容直接包含在您的应用程序中要安全得多,因为InAppBrowser将使用本机浏览器的安全功能,不会让网站访问您的Cordova环境。即使你信任第三方网站并将其直接包含在你的应用程序中,该第三方网站也可能链接到恶意的网络内容。

trans-unit.source: Using a SPA can help you organize your application in a more efficient manner, but it also has specific benefits for Cordova applications. A Cordova application must wait for the deviceready event to fire before any plugins may be used. If you do not use a SPA, and your user clicks to go from one page to another, you will have to wait for deviceready to fire again before you make use of a plugin. This is easy to forget as your application gets larger.
trans-unit.target: 使用SPA可以帮助您以更有效的方式组织应用程序，但是它对Cordova应用程序也有特殊的好处。Cordova应用程序必须等待deviceready事件触发，然后才能使用任何插件。如果您不使用SPA，并且用户单击从一个页面转到另一个页面，则在使用插件之前，您将必须等待设备就绪再次启动。随着应用程序变大，这很容易忘记。

trans-unit.source: Using self-signed certificates on your server is not recommended. If you desire SSL, then it is highly recommended that your server have a certificate that has been properly signed by a well-known CA (certificate authority). The inability to do true certificate pinning makes this important.
trans-unit.target: 不建议在服务器上使用自签名的证书。如果你希望使用SSL,那么强烈建议你的服务器拥有一个由知名CA(证书颁发机构)正确签署的证书。由于无法进行真正的证书销号,所以这一点很重要。

trans-unit.target: 使用 fullscreen 标志属性，可以强制应用程序以全屏模式启动。

trans-unit.target: 利用上面的配置示例,我们来介绍一些用例,以便更好地理解异常。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are page and column.The manner in which column- or page-breaking occurs. This property determines whether certain CSS properties regarding column- and page-breaking are honored or ignored. When this property is set to column, the content respects the CSS properties related to column-breaking in place of page-breaking.
trans-unit.target: 有效值为page和column.发生分栏或分页的方式。此属性决定了是尊重还是忽略某些有关分栏和分页的CSS属性。当此属性设置为列时,内容会尊重与分栏相关的CSS属性,而不是分页。

trans-unit.source: Valid values for the --appx flag are 8.1-win, 8.1-phone, and uap (for Windows 10 Universal Apps). These options also apply to the cordova run command.
trans-unit.target: --appx 标志的有效值为 8.1-win ， 8.1-phone 和 uap （对于Windows 10 Universal Apps）。这些选项也适用于 cordova run 命令。

trans-unit.target: 在准备过程中恢复父插件时要使用的CLI变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Verify that the Code Signing Identity setting within the Code Signing section within the build settings is set to your provisioning profile name.
trans-unit.target: 验证是否将构建设置中“ 代码签名”部分中的“代码签名身份”设置设置为您的供应配置文件名称。

trans-unit.source: Version 5.0.0 adds support for Android API level 23 (Marshmallow). Android Marshmallow introduced a new permissions model that may require you to update some installed plugins to ensure they are compatible with newer phones. Older plugin versions that do not properly handle permissions can cause your application to crash unexpectedly. Note that this does not affect every plugin, but only those that access Android permissions deemed dangerous (see the table of dangerous permissions).
trans-unit.target: 5.0.0版增加了对Android API级别23（棉花糖）的支持。Android Marshmallow引入了新的权限模型，该模型可能要求您更新一些已安装的插件以确保它们与较新的手机兼容。无法正确处理权限的较旧插件版本可能会导致您的应用程序意外崩溃。请注意，这并不影响每个插件，而是仅影响那些被视为危险的访问Android权限的插件（请参阅危险权限表）。

Vibrates the device for a given amount of time.

trans-unit.source: Virtually the same as the Safari version, this works with Android only but can be used from any desktop operating system. Once connected, you get the same Chrome Dev Tools experience for your mobile applications as you do with your desktop applications. Even better, the Chrome Dev Tools have a mirror option that shows your app running on the mobile device. This is more than just a view - you can scroll and click from dev tools and it updates on the mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 几乎与Safari版本相同,它仅适用于Android,但可以从任何桌面操作系统中使用。一旦连接,您的移动应用程序将获得与桌面应用程序相同的Chrome Dev Tools体验。更好的是,Chrome Dev Tools 有一个镜像选项,可以显示您的应用程序在移动设备上的运行情况。这不仅仅是一个视图-您可以从开发工具中滚动和点击,它在移动设备上更新。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio provides powerful tools to debug your application. You can refer to this article to get started with it.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio提供了功能强大的工具来调试应用程序。你可以参考这个文章开始使用它。

trans-unit.source: We already showed how to write to a file that you just created in the sandboxed file system. What if you need to get access to an existing file and convert that to something you can store on your device? In this example, you obtain a file using an xhr request, and then save it to the cache in the sandboxed file system.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经演示了如何向一个刚在沙盒文件系统中创建的文件写入。如果您需要获取对现有文件的访问权,并将其转换为可以存储在设备上的东西,那该怎么办?在这个例子中,您使用xhr请求获取一个文件,然后将其保存到沙盒文件系统的缓存中。

trans-unit.source: We'll try to show that error in a message box. We can do that by injecting a script that calls the alert function. That said, this won't work in browsers on Windows devices so we'll have to look at the parameter of the executeScript callback function to see if our attempt worked. If it didn't work out for us, we'll just show the error message in a <div> on the page.
trans-unit.target: 我们将尝试在消息框中显示该错误。我们可以通过注入一个调用 alert 功能的脚本来做到这一点。就是说，这在Windows设备上的浏览器中将不起作用，因此我们必须查看 executeScript 回调函数的参数以查看我们的尝试是否有效。如果对我们而言不可行，我们将在页面上的 <div> 中显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: We'll use the open function to load the help page. We're setting the hidden property to yes so that we can show the browser only after the page content has loaded. That way, users don't see a blank browser while they wait for content to appear. When the loadstop event is raised, we'll know when the content has loaded. We'll handle that event shortly.
trans-unit.target: 我们将使用 open 功能来加载帮助页面。我们将 hidden 属性设置为 yes ,以便仅在页面内容加载后才能显示浏览器。这样，用户在等待内容出现时不会看到空白的浏览器。当 loadstop 引发事件，当内容已经载入我们会知道。我们将尽快处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: WebSQL provides an API for storing data in a structured database that can be queried using a standard SQL syntax (specifically, SQLite). As such, it provides all the power (and complexity) of SQL.
trans-unit.target: WebSQL提供了一个用于在结构化数据库中存储数据的API，可以使用标准SQL语法（特别是SQLite）进行查询。这样，它提供了SQL的所有功能（和复杂性）。
是什么让安卓系统与众不同?

trans-unit.target: 当 <platform-spec> 是本地路径时，直接链接平台库而不是复制它（支持因平台而异；对于平台开发很有用）

trans-unit.source: When adding a platform or plugin, details about the app's platform and plugin versions are automatically saved to the package.json file. It is also possible to add a platform or plugin by editing the package.json file directly, assuming you know the right tags and syntax. It is not possible to remove plugins or platforms in this manner. The recommended method of adding and removing plugins and platforms is with the Cordova CLI commands cordova plugin add|remove ... and cordova platform add|remove ... to avoid any out of sync issues.
trans-unit.target: 添加平台或插件时，有关应用程序平台和插件版本的详细信息会自动保存到 package.json 文件中。假设您知道正确的标记和语法，也可以通过直接编辑 package.json 文件来添加平台或插件。无法以这种方式删除插件或平台。推荐的添加和删除插件和平台的方法是使用Cordova CLI命令 cordova plugin add|remove ... 和 cordova platform add|remove ... 以避免任何不同步的问题。

trans-unit.source: When adding a plugin to a project, the CLI will resolve the plugin based on the following criteria (listed in order of precedence):
trans-unit.target: 当在项目中添加插件时,CLI将根据以下标准(按优先顺序排列)来解析插件。

trans-unit.source: When adding a plugin, if the plugin supports both the electron and browser platform, the electron portion will be used. If the plugin misses electron but contains the browser implementation, it will fall back on the browser implementation.
trans-unit.target: 添加插件时，如果插件同时支持 electron 平台和 browser 平台，则将使用 electron 部分。如果该插件错过了 electron 但包含 browser 实现，则它将退回到 browser 实现上。

trans-unit.source: When an error is thrown, one of the following codes will be used.
trans-unit.target: 当发生错误时,将使用以下代码之一。

trans-unit.source: When building your user interface, it is important to think about all platforms that you are targeting and the differences between the user's expectations. For example, an Android application that has an iOS-style UI will probably not go over well with users. This sometimes is even enforced by the various application stores. Because of this, it is important that you respect the conventions of each platform and therefore are familiar with the various Human Interface Guidelines:
trans-unit.target: 在构建用户界面时,重要的是要考虑到你所针对的所有平台以及用户期望的差异。例如,一个安卓应用如果采用iOS风格的用户界面,很可能不会受到用户的欢迎。这有时甚至是由各个应用商店强制执行的。正因为如此,你必须尊重每个平台的惯例,从而熟悉各种人机界面指南。

trans-unit.source: When called from a resume event handler, interactive functions such as alert() need to be wrapped in a setTimeout() call with a timeout value of zero, or else the app hangs. For example:
trans-unit.target: 从 resume 事件处理程序中调用时，诸如 alert() 之类的交互功能需要包装在 setTimeout() 调用中，且其超时值为零，否则应用程序将挂起。例如：
什么时候会出现这种情况?

trans-unit.source: When capturing audio, video, or images on the Android platform, there is a chance that the application will get destroyed after the Cordova Webview is pushed to the background by the native capture application. See the Android Lifecycle Guide for a full description of the issue. In this case, the success and failure callbacks passed to the capture method will not be fired and instead the results of the call will be delivered via a document event that fires after the Cordova resume event.
trans-unit.target: 在Android平台上捕获音频，视频或图像时，原生捕获应用程序将Cordova Webview推送到后台后，该应用程序有可能被破坏。有关此问题的完整说明，请参见《Android Lifecycle Guide》。在这种情况下，不会触发传递给capture方法的成功和失败回调，而是通过在Cordova resume事件之后触发的document事件传递调用结果。

trans-unit.source: When catching exceptions and returning errors, it's important for the sake of clarity that errors returned to JavaScript match Java's exception names as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在捕捉异常和返回错误时,为了清晰起见,返回给JavaScript的错误要尽量与Java的异常名相匹配。

trans-unit.source: When creating subfolders, you need to create each folder separately as shown in the preceding code.
trans-unit.target: 在创建子文件夹时,需要分别创建每个文件夹,如前面的代码所示。

trans-unit.source: When first starting out, it may be easiest to use the cross-platform workflow to create an app, as described in Create your first app guide. You then have the option to switch to a platform-centered workflow if you need the greater control the SDK provides.
trans-unit.target: 首次启动时，使用跨平台工作流程创建应用程序可能是最简单的，如创建您的第一个应用程序指南中所述。如果需要SDK提供更大的控制权，则可以选择切换到以平台为中心的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: When installing a plugin with the example below, socket.js is copied to www/plugins/my-plugin-id/socket.js, and added as an entry to www/cordova_plugins.js. At load time, code in cordova.js uses XHR to read each file and inject a <script> tag into HTML.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下示例安装插件时，将socket.js复制到 www/plugins/my-plugin-id/socket.js ，并将其作为条目添加到 www/cordova_plugins.js 。在加载时， cordova.js 中的代码使用XHR读取每个文件，并将 <script> 标记注入HTML。

trans-unit.source: When installing from a local path, creates a symbolic link instead of copying files. The extent to which files are linked varies by platform. Useful for plugin development.
trans-unit.target: 当从本地路径安装时,创建一个符号链接,而不是复制文件。文件链接的程度因平台而异。对插件开发很有用。

trans-unit.source: When installing on Windows you also need to set JAVA_HOME Environment Variable according to your JDK installation path (see Setting Environment Variables)
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上安装时，还需要根据JDK安装路径设置 JAVA_HOME 环境变量（请参阅设置环境变量）。

trans-unit.source: When installing on Windows, you need to add Gradle to your path, (see Setting Environment Variables)
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上安装时，需要将Gradle添加到您的路径中（请参阅设置环境变量）。

trans-unit.source: When loading a page, the amount of time to wait before throwing a timeout error.
trans-unit.target: 当加载一个页面时,在抛出超时错误之前等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: When looking up plugins by ID, look in this directory and each of its subdirectories before hitting the registry. Multiple search paths can be specified. Use ':' as a separator in *nix based systems and ';' for Windows.
trans-unit.target: 当按ID查找插件时，请在进入注册表之前先查看此目录及其每个子目录。可以指定多个搜索路径。在基于 *nix 的系统中使用'：'作为分隔符，而';' 对于Windows。

trans-unit.source: When opening an existing database, if the specified version does not match the version of the database, an exception will be thrown and the database will not open. However, if you specify an empty string for the version, the database will open regardless of its current version (and you can query the current version via db.version). Be wary, however - if the database is being created, it will be created with its version set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 打开现有数据库时，如果指定的版本与数据库的版本不匹配，则会引发异常，并且数据库也不会打开。但是，如果为版本指定一个空字符串，则无论当前版本如何，数据库都将打开（您可以通过 db.version 查询当前版本）。但是要当心-如果正在创建数据库，则会在创建数据库时将其版本设置为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: When running Cordova on Android, using android:debuggable="true" in the application manifest will permit SSL errors such as certificate chain validation errors on self-signed certs. So you can use self-signed certs in this configuration, but this is not a configuration that should be used when your application is in production. It is meant to be used only during application development.
trans-unit.target: 在Android上运行Cordova时，在应用程序清单中使用 android:debuggable="true" 将允许SSL错误，例如自签名证书上的证书链验证错误。因此，您可以在此配置中使用自签名证书，但这不是在您的应用程序投入生产时应使用的配置。它只能在应用程序开发期间使用。

trans-unit.source: When running in the Phone 8.1 emulator, always detects navigator.connection.type as Connection.ETHERNET.
trans-unit.target: 在Phone 8.1模拟器中运行时，始终将 navigator.connection.type 检测为 Connection.ETHERNET 。

trans-unit.source: When selecting a file using the file picker, you also need to set the CameraOptions object. In this example, set the sourceType to Camera.PictureSourceType.SAVEDPHOTOALBUM. To open the file picker, call getPicture just as you did in the previous example, passing in the success and error callbacks along with CameraOptions object.
trans-unit.target: 使用文件选择器选择文件时，还需要设置CameraOptions对象。在此示例中，将 sourceType 设置为 Camera.PictureSourceType.SAVEDPHOTOALBUM 。要打开文件选择器，调用 getPicture 就像你在前面的例子中那样，在成功和错误回调传递与CameraOptions对象一起。

trans-unit.source: When the loadstopcallback event is raised, we know that the content has loaded and we can make the browser visible. This sort of trick can create the impression of better performance. The truth is that whether you show the browser before content loads or not, the load times are exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: 当 loadstopcallback 事件引发的，我们知道的内容加载，我们可以使浏览器可见。这种技巧可以给人留下更好的印象。事实是，无论您是否在内容加载之前显示浏览器，加载时间都完全相同。

trans-unit.source: When the OS destroys the Cordova activity that was pushed into the background by a plugin, any pending callbacks are lost as well. This means that if you passed a callback to the plugin that launched the new activity (e.g. the camera plugin), that callback will NOT be fired when the application is recreated. However, starting in cordova-android 5.1.0, the resume event's payload will contain any pending plugin results from the plugin request that launched the external activity made prior to the activity being destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 当操作系统销毁由插件推送到后台的Cordova活动时，所有挂起的回调也会丢失。这意味着，如果您将回调传递给启动新活动的插件（例如camera插件），则在重新创建应用程序时不会触发该回调。但是，从cordova-android 5.1.0开始， resume 事件的有效负载将包含插件请求发出的所有未决插件结果，这些请求启动了在活动被破坏之前发起的外部活动。

trans-unit.source: When the capture operation finishes, it invokes the CaptureCB callback with an array of MediaFile objects describing each captured image file. If the user terminates the operation before capturing an image, the CaptureErrorCB callback executes with a CaptureError object featuring a CaptureError.CAPTURE_NO_MEDIA_FILES error code.
trans-unit.target: 捕获操作完成后，它将使用描述每个捕获的图像文件的 MediaFile 对象数组调用 CaptureCB 回调。如果用户在捕获图像之前终止了该操作，则 CaptureErrorCB 回调将使用具有 CaptureError.CAPTURE_NO_MEDIA_FILES 错误代码的 CaptureError 对象执行。

trans-unit.source: When the capture operation finishes, it the CaptureCB callback executes with an array of MediaFile objects describing each captured video clip file. If the user terminates the operation before capturing a video clip, the CaptureErrorCB callback executes with a CaptureError object featuring a CaptureError.CAPTURE_NO_MEDIA_FILES error code.
trans-unit.target: 捕获操作完成后，将使用描述每个捕获的视频剪辑文件的 MediaFile 对象数组执行 CaptureCB 回调。如果用户在捕获视频剪辑之前终止了该操作，则 CaptureErrorCB 回调 CaptureError 具有 CaptureError.CAPTURE_NO_MEDIA_FILES 错误代码的CaptureError对象执行。

trans-unit.source: When the capture operation finishes, the CaptureCallback executes with an array of MediaFile objects describing each captured audio clip file. If the user terminates the operation before an audio clip is captured, the CaptureErrorCallback executes with a CaptureError object, featuring the CaptureError.CAPTURE_NO_MEDIA_FILES error code.
trans-unit.target: 捕获操作完成后， CaptureCallback 将使用描述每个捕获的音频剪辑文件的 MediaFile 对象数组执行。如果用户在捕获音频剪辑之前终止操作，则 CaptureErrorCallback CaptureError 对象执行，该对象具有 CaptureError.CAPTURE_NO_MEDIA_FILES 错误代码。

trans-unit.target: 使用 destinationType.FILE_URI 时，照片将保存在应用程序的临时目录中。应用程序结束时，该应用程序临时目录的内容将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When you create your Windows Runtime Component, any class that is defined as public ref class sealed is considered an 'activatable class' and will be callable from JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 创建Windows运行时组件时，定义为 public ref class sealed 任何类均被视为“可激活类”，并且可以从JavaScript进行调用。

trans-unit.source: When you get file system access using requestFileSystem, access is granted for the sandboxed file system only (the sandbox limits access to the app itself), not for general access to any file system location on the device. (To access file system locations outside the sandboxed storage, use other methods such as window.resolveLocalFileSystemURL, which support platform-specific locations. For one example of this, see Append a File.)
trans-unit.target: 使用 requestFileSystem 获得文件系统访问权限时，仅授予沙盒文件系统访问权限（沙盒限制对应用程序本身的访问），而不授予对设备上任何文件系统位置的常规访问权限。（要访问沙盒存储外部的文件系统位置，请使用其他方法，例如window.resolveLocalFileSystemURL，它们支持特定于平台的位置。有关此示例，请参阅附加文件。）

trans-unit.source: When you make a request, you get a request object, which provides onerror and onsuccess events, as well as properties such as result, error and readyState.
trans-unit.target: 发出请求时，您将获得一个请求对象，该对象提供 onerror 和 onsuccess 事件以及诸如 result ， error 和 readyState 之类的属性。

trans-unit.target: 当你重建项目时,安卓版的特点是自定义字体大小,而其他的字体不变。

trans-unit.source: Where PERMISSION_NAME is replaced with the name of an Android permission. The plugin.xml file can be found in the plugin's folder in your Cordova project (e.g. plugins/example-plugin/plugin.xml). Consult the documentation of any plugins using dangerous permissions to determine what steps need to be taken to ensure cordova-android 5.0.0+ compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 其中 PERMISSION_NAME 被替换为Android权限的名称。该 plugin.xml 的文件可以在插件的文件夹中科尔多瓦项目中找到（如 plugins/example-plugin/plugin.xml ）。请查阅所有使用危险权限的插件的文档，以确定需要采取哪些步骤来确保cordova-android 5.0.0+的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Where the file or directory is located in the plugin package, relative to the plugin.xml document. If a file does not exist at the specified src location, the CLI stops and reverses the installation process, issues a notification about the conflict, and exits with a non-zero code.
trans-unit.target: 文件或目录在plugin软件包中的位置，相对于 plugin.xml 文档。如果在指定的src位置不存在文件，则CLI会停止并撤消安装过程，发出有关冲突的通知，并以非零代码退出。

trans-unit.source: Where the file or directory should be located in the Cordova app, relative to the www directory. If a file already exists at the target location, the CLI stops and reverses the installation process, issues a notification about the conflict, and exits with a non-zero code.
trans-unit.target: 文件或目录应在Cordova应用程序中相对于 www 目录的位置。如果目标位置已存在文件，则CLI会停止并反转安装过程，发出有关冲突的通知，并以非零代码退出。

trans-unit.source: Whether you distribute a plugin as Java file or as a jar file of its own, the plugin must be specified in your Cordova-Android application's res/xml/config.xml file. See Application Plugins for more information on how to use the plugin.xml file to inject this feature element:
trans-unit.target: 无论您将插件作为Java文件分发还是作为其自己的jar文件分发，都必须在您的Cordova-Android应用程序的 res/xml/config.xml 文件中指定该插件。有关如何使用 plugin.xml 文件注入此 feature 元素的更多信息，请参见应用程序插件：

trans-unit.source: While Cordova allows you to easily deploy an app for many different platforms, sometimes you need to add customizations. In that case, you don't want to modify the source files in various www directories within the top-level platforms directory, because they're regularly replaced with the top-level www directory's cross-platform source.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Cordova允许您轻松地为许多不同的平台部署应用程序，但有时您需要添加自定义项。在这种情况下，您不想在顶级 platforms 目录中的各种 www 目录中修改源文件，因为它们经常被顶级 www 目录的跨平台源替换。

trans-unit.source: While reading the documentation, look for sections which outline different behaviors or requirements on multiple platforms. If present, these would be in a section titled "Android Quirks", "iOS Quirks", etc. Read through these quirks and be aware of them as you work with Cordova.
trans-unit.target: 在阅读文档时,寻找概述多个平台上不同行为或要求的部分。如果存在的话,这些将在标题为 "Android Quirks"、"iOS Quirks "等的章节中。阅读这些怪癖,并在使用Cordova时注意它们。

trans-unit.source: While scrolling of the WebView is enabled by default in "Remote mode" and on the other platforms, in "Local Mode" this is not the case. If scrolling is required in "Local Mode", it can be enabled using the CSS overflow property.
trans-unit.target: 虽然默认情况下在“远程模式”和其他平台上启用了WebView的滚动，但在“本地模式”中则不是这种情况。如果在“本地模式”中需要滚动，则可以使用CSS overflow 属性启用滚动。

trans-unit.source: Whitepaper about well known security flaws in Webview based hybrid applications
trans-unit.target: 关于基于Webview的混合应用程序中众所周知的安全缺陷的白皮书。

trans-unit.source: Width in pixels to scale image. Must be used with targetHeight. Aspect ratio remains constant.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位缩放图像的宽度。必须与 targetHeight 一起使用。长宽比保持恒定。

trans-unit.source: Will disable updates check. Alternatively set "optOut": true in ~/.config/configstore/update-notifier-cordova.json or set NO_UPDATE_NOTIFIER environment variable with any value (see details in update-notifier docs).
trans-unit.target: 将禁用更新检查。或者在 ~/.config/configstore/update-notifier-cordova.json 设置 "optOut": true 或使用任何值设置 NO_UPDATE_NOTIFIER 环境变量（请参阅update-notifier docs中的详细信息）。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 introduces a new feature called "Remote mode" for HTML applications. Prior to it, Windows 8.1 apps worked on what is now termed as "Local Mode" in Windows 10, in which HTML Applications have full access to the native Windows API surface and capabilities. Local Mode disallows inline script in order to prevent script injection attacks, which could result in leaking personally-identifiable information due to malicious code. It also requires developers who perform DOM manipulation to do so within an explicit context (MSApp.execUnsafeLocalFunction).
trans-unit.target: Windows 10为HTML应用程序引入了一项称为“远程模式”的新功能。在此之前，Windows 8.1应用程序可以在Windows 10中现在称为“本地模式”的环境中工作，在HTML 10中，HTML应用程序可以完全访问本机Windows API表面和功能。本地模式禁止内联脚本，以防止脚本注入攻击，这可能导致由于恶意代码而泄漏个人身份信息。它还要求执行DOM操作的开发人员在显式上下文（ MSApp.execUnsafeLocalFunction ）中执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 supports a new "Remote" mode for Cordova apps (and HTML apps in general). This mode enables apps to have much more freedom with respect to use of DOM manipulation and common web patterns such as the use of inline script, but does so by reducing the set of capabilities your app may use when submitted to the public Windows Store. For more information about Windows 10 and Remote Mode, look at the Understanding Remote Mode vs Local Mode section.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10为Cordova应用程序（和通常的HTML应用程序）支持新的“远程”模式。此模式使应用程序在使用DOM操作和常见的Web模式（例如内联脚本）方面拥有更大的自由度，但是通过减少应用程序提交给公共Windows Store时可能使用的功能集来实现此目的。有关Windows 10和远程模式的更多信息，请参阅“ 了解远程模式与本地模式”部分。

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10, 32- or 64-bit, along with Visual Studio 2015 or higher.
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1或Windows 10（32位或64位），以及Visual Studio 2015或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Windows Cordova plugins are essentially a thin wrapper around existing WinJS provided functions, but assuming you will want to define your JS common interface for multiple devices, you will typically have one JS file that provides the API:
trans-unit.target: Windows Cordova插件本质上是现有WinJS提供的函数的薄包装,但假设你想为多个设备定义你的JS通用接口,你通常会有一个JS文件提供API。

trans-unit.source: Windows Phone 7 does not have a default audio recording application, so a simple user interface is provided.
trans-unit.target: Windows Phone 7没有默认的录音应用,所以提供了一个简单的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Windows devices can use MP3, M4A and WMA formats for recorded audio. However in most cases it is not possible to use MP3 for audio recording on Windows Phone 8.1 devices, because an MP3 encoder is not shipped with Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: Windows store apps (windows-uwp) will only display orientation changes if the device has some sort of accelerometer. The internal state of the "orientation" will still be kept, but the actual screen won't rotate unless the device supports it.
trans-unit.target: Windows商店应用(windows-uwp)只有在设备具有某种加速度计的情况下才会显示方向变化。内部的 "方向 "状态仍然会被保留,但实际屏幕不会旋转,除非设备支持。

trans-unit.source: With Cordova 2.1.0, CordovaLib has been upgraded to use Automatic Reference Counting (ARC). You don't need to upgrade to ARC to use CordovaLib, but if you want to upgrade your project to use ARC, please use the Xcode migration wizard from the menu: Edit → Refactor → Convert to Objective-C ARC..., de-select libCordova.a, then run the wizard to completion.
trans-unit.target: 在Cordova 2.1.0中， CordovaLib 已升级为使用自动引用计数（ARC）。您无需升级到ARC即可使用CordovaLib，但如果要升级项目以使用ARC，请使用菜单中的Xcode迁移向导：编辑→重构→转换为Objective-C ARC ...，de -选择libCordova.a，然后运行向导以完成操作。

trans-unit.source: With Safari's web inspector you can debug the webview and js code in your Cordova application. This works only on macOS. It uses Safari to connect to your device (or the simulator) and will connect the browser's dev tools to the Cordova application. You get what you expect from dev tools - DOM inspection/manipulation, a JavaScript debugger, network inspection, the console, and more. Like Xcode, with Safari's web inspector you can set breakpoints in the JavaScript code and view the state of the variables at that time. You can view any errors, warnings or messages that are printed to the console. You can also run JavaScript commands directly from the console as your app is running.
trans-unit.target: 通过Safari的网络检查器,你可以调试Cordova应用程序中的webview和js代码。这只在macOS上工作。它使用Safari连接到你的设备(或模拟器),并将浏览器的开发工具连接到Cordova应用程序。你可以从开发工具中获得你所期望的东西--DOM检查/操作、JavaScript调试器、网络检查、控制台等。像Xcode一样,通过Safari的网络检查器,你可以在JavaScript代码中设置断点,并查看当时变量的状态。你可以查看打印到控制台的任何错误、警告或消息。你也可以在应用程序运行时直接从控制台运行JavaScript命令。

trans-unit.source: With Xcode you can debug the iOS native side of your Cordova application. Make sure the Debug Area is showing (View -> Debug Area). Once your app is running on the device (or simulator), you can view log output in the debug area. This is where any errors or warnings will print. You can also set breakpoints within the source files. This will allow you to step through the code one line at a time and view the state of the variables at that time. The state of the variables is shown in the debug area when a breakpoint is hit. Once your app is up and running on the device, you can bring up Safari's web inspector (as described below) to debug the webview and JS side of your application. For more details refer to the Apple Debugging Support docs.
trans-unit.target: 使用Xcode，您可以调试Cordova应用程序的iOS本机端。确保显示调试区域（查看->调试区域）。应用在设备（或模拟器）上运行后，您可以在调试区域中查看日志输出。在此将打印任何错误或警告。您还可以在源文件中设置断点。这样一来，您就可以单步执行代码，并同时查看变量的状态。遇到断点时，变量的状态显示在调试区域中。在您的应用启动并在设备上运行后，您可以调出Safari的Web检查器（如下所述）来调试应用的Webview和JS端。有关更多详细信息，请参阅Apple调试支持文档。

trans-unit.source: With v1.0.0, the fullPath attribute is the path to the file, relative to the root of the HTML filesystem. So, the above paths would now both be represented by a FileEntry object with a fullPath of

trans-unit.source: Without any <access> tags, only requests to file:// URLs are allowed. However, the default Cordova application includes <access origin="*"> by default.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何 <access> 标记，仅允许对 file:// URL的请求。但是，默认情况下，默认的Cordova应用程序包括 <access origin="*"> 。

trans-unit.source: Without any <allow-intent> tags, no requests to external URLs are allowed. However, the default Cordova application includes a quite liberal set of allow-intent entries by default. It is advised to narrow this down based on each app's needs.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何 <allow-intent> 标记，则不允许对外部URL的请求。但是，默认情况下，默认的Cordova应用程序包括一组相当宽松的 allow-intent 条目。建议根据每个应用程序的需求缩小此范围。

trans-unit.source: Without this line, the File plugin will use Compatibility as the default. If a preference tag is present, and is not one of these values, the application will not start.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此行，则File插件将使用 Compatibility 作为默认值。如果存在首选项标签，并且不是这些值之一，则该应用程序将无法启动。

trans-unit.source: Without this line, the File plugin will use Internal as the default. If a preference tag is present, and is not one of these values, the application will not start.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此行，则File插件将使用 Internal 作为默认值。如果存在首选项标签，并且不是这些值之一，则该应用程序将无法启动。

trans-unit.source: Working with a Cordova project, it is recommended to create an Electron settings file within the project's root directory, and set its the relative path in the preference option ElectronSettingsFilePath, in the config.xml file.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用Cordova项目在项目的根目录中创建一个Electron设置文件，并在 config.xml 文件的首选项选项 ElectronSettingsFilePath 中设置其相对路径。

trans-unit.source: Works for Windows 8.1 projects only. Allowed values: "light", "dark". Set to "dark" if you use the BackgroundColor="white" or another light color to avoid Windows Store submissions errors.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于Windows 8.1项目。允许的值：“浅”，“暗”。如果您使用 BackgroundColor="white" 或其他浅色，则设置为“ dark” 以避免Windows Store提交错误。

trans-unit.target: 仅适用于Chrome、Firefox和Opera(因为IE和Safari不支持navigator.getUserMedia API)。

trans-unit.source: You also need a FileEntry object to read an existing file. Use the file property of FileEntry to get the file reference, and then create a new FileReader object. trans-unit.target: 您还需要一个FileEntry对象来读取现有文件。使用FileEntry的file属性获取文件引用，然后创建一个新的FileReader对象。您可以使用 readAsText 之类的方法来启动读取操作。读取操作完成后， this.result 将存储读取操作的结果。

For example, an app can incorporate a back button graphic into the iOS interface, stored in merges/ios/img/back_button.png, while the Android version can instead capture backbutton events from the corresponding hardware button.

trans-unit.target: 您可以将插件发布到任何基于 npmjs 的注册表，但是推荐的插件是npm Registry。其他开发人员可以使用 plugman 或Cordova CLI 自动安装您的插件。

trans-unit.source: You can supply unique icons for the application and installer by setting the target attribute. As mentioned above, the installer image should be 512x512 pixels to work across all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置 target 属性为应用程序和安装程序提供唯一的图标。如上所述，安装程序映像应为512x512像素，以在所有平台上正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You can test all of the Cordova features using the XCode or any other IDE such as JetBrain's AppCode, but you need to use XCode to sign before submitting to the App Store. To sign the apps, you must also be a member of Apple's OS X Developer Program.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用XCode或其他任何IDE（例如JetBrain的AppCode）测试Cordova的所有功能，但是在提交到App Store之前，需要使用XCode进行签名。要签署这些应用程序，您还必须是Apple OS X Developer Program的成员。

trans-unit.source: You can test many of the Cordova features using the iOS simulator installed with the iOS SDK and Xcode, but you need an actual device to fully test all of the app's device features before submitting to the App Store. The device must have at least iOS 9 installed, the minimum iOS version supported since the release of cordova-ios v4.4.0.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用安装在iOS SDK和Xcode中的iOS模拟器来测试Cordova的许多功能,但在提交到App Store之前,你需要一个实际的设备来全面测试应用程序的所有设备功能。设备必须至少安装了iOS 9,这是cordova-ios v4.4.0发布后支持的最低iOS版本。

You can even point to a CSS file in your project.

trans-unit.source: Your application cannot call navigator.splashscreen.show() until the app has started and the deviceready event has fired. But since typically the splash screen is meant to be visible before your app has started, that would seem to defeat the purpose of the splash screen. Providing some configuration in config.xml will automatically show the splash screen immediately after your app launch and before it has fully started and received the deviceready event. For this reason, it is unlikely you need to call navigator.splashscreen.show() to make the splash screen visible for app startup.
trans-unit.target: 在应用启动并触发 deviceready 事件之前，您的应用无法调用 navigator.splashscreen.show() 。但是，由于通常在启动应用程序之前就可以看到初始屏幕，因此这似乎违背了初始屏幕的目的。在 config.xml 中提供一些配置后，将在应用启动后，完全启动并收到 deviceready 事件之前立即自动 show 启动屏幕。因此，您不太可能需要调用 navigator.splashscreen.show() 来使启动屏幕对于应用程序启动可见。

trans-unit.source: Your application is susceptible to being destroyed by the OS whenever it leaves the sight of the user. There are two main situations in which this can occur. The first and most obvious case is when the user presses the home button or switches to another application.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的应用程序离开用户的视线,就很容易被操作系统销毁。有两种主要情况会发生这种情况。第一种也是最明显的情况是当用户按下主键或切换到另一个应用程序时。

trans-unit.source: Your plugin launches an Activity for a result
trans-unit.target: 您的插件为一个结果启动了一个活动

trans-unit.source: a mobile developer and want to extend an application across more than one platform, without having to re-implement it with each platform's language and tool set.
trans-unit.target: 一个移动开发者,想要在多个平台上扩展应用,而不需要用每个平台的语言和工具集重新实现它。

trans-unit.source: a mobile developer interested in mixing native application components with a WebView (special browser window) that can access device-level APIs, or if you want to develop a plugin interface between native and WebView components.
trans-unit.target: 有兴趣将本机应用程序组件与可以访问设备级API 的WebView（特殊浏览器窗口）混合使用的移动开发人员，或者您想在本机和WebView组件之间开发插件接口。

trans-unit.source: a web developer and want to deploy a web app that's packaged for distribution in various app store portals.
trans-unit.target: 一个web开发者,想部署一个web应用,并将其打包发布在各个应用商店门户。
在 build.json 文件中添加 buildFlag 选项：

trans-unit.source: add one or more --buildFlag options to cordova build windows or cordova run windows commands:
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个 --buildFlag 选项添加到 cordova build windows 或 cordova run windows 命令：

trans-unit.source: allows-arbitrary-loads-for-media (Boolean, defaults to 'false', new in iOS 10. New in cordova-ios@4.5.0, fixed to use the proper attribute name). The old attribute allows-arbitrary-loads-in-media is now deprecated.
trans-unit.target: allow-arbitrary-loads-for-media（布尔值，默认为'false'，iOS 10中的新增功能。cordova-ios@4.5.0中的新增功能，已固定为使用正确的属性名称）。现在已弃用了旧的属性 allows-arbitrary-loads-in-media 。

trans-unit.source: allows-arbitrary-loads-in-web-content (Boolean, defaults to 'false', new in iOS 10)
allows-local-networking (Boolean, defaults to 'false', new in iOS 10)
trans-unit.target: 允许本地联网(布尔值,默认为'false',iOS 10中新增)

trans-unit.source: and remove any #ifdef wrappers around any Cordova imports, they are not needed anymore (the imports are now unified)
trans-unit.target: 并删除所有Cordova导入周围的所有 #ifdef 包装器，不再需要它们（导入已统一）

trans-unit.source: anything important should fit within the center
appears in a project's top-level www directory.
trans-unit.target: 出现在项目的顶级 www 目录中。

trans-unit.source: cordova-android includes a number of scripts that allow the platform to be used without the full Cordova CLI. This development path may offer you a greater range of development options in certain situations than the cross-platform cordova CLI. For example, you need to use shell tools when deploying a custom Cordova WebView alongside native components. Before using this development path, you must still configure the Android SDK environment as described in Requirements and Support above.
trans-unit.target: cordova-android包含许多脚本，这些脚本无需完全的Cordova CLI即可使用该平台。在某些情况下，此开发路径可能会为您提供比跨平台cordova CLI更大的开发选择范围。例如，在将自定义Cordova WebView与本机组件一起部署时，需要使用shell工具。使用此开发路径之前，您仍然必须按照上面的“ 需求和支持”中所述配置Android SDK环境。

trans-unit.source: cordova-ios includes a number of scripts that allow the platform to be used without the full Cordova CLI. This development path may offer you a greater range of development options in certain situations than the cross-platform cordova CLI. For example, you need to use shell tools when deploying a custom Cordova WebView alongside native components. Before using this development path, you must still configure the SDK environment as described in Requirements and Support above.
trans-unit.target: cordova-ios包含许多脚本，这些脚本允许在不使用完整Cordova CLI的情况下使用平台。在某些情况下，此开发路径可能会为您提供比跨平台cordova CLI更大的开发选择范围。例如，在将自定义Cordova WebView与本机组件一起部署时，需要使用shell工具。在使用此开发路径之前，您仍然必须按照上面的需求和支持中所述配置SDK环境。

trans-unit.source: create a package.json file for your plugin:
trans-unit.target: 为您的插件创建一个 package.json 文件：

使用单个 <icon ...> 元素为不同的设备比例因子定义一组图标，例如： xml <icon src="res/windows/AppListIcon.png" target="Square44x44Logo" /> 等效于以下几行： xml <icon src="res/windows/Square44x44Logo.scale-100.png" width="44" height="44" /> <icon src="res/windows/Square44x44Logo.scale-150.png" width="66" height="66" /> <icon src="res/windows/Square44x44Logo.scale-200.png" width="88" height="88" /> <icon src="res/windows/Square44x44Logo.scale-240.png" width="106" height="106" />

trans-unit.source: define icons with scale factors other than scale-100 and scale-240 (and any other MRT qualifiers)
trans-unit.target: 使用除 scale-100 和 scale-240 （以及其他MRT限定词）之外的比例因子定义图标

trans-unit.source: element does not apply to your workflow. If you work directly in an SDK and using the platform-specific config.xml file as source, you use the
trans-unit.target: 元素不适用于你的工作流。如果你直接在SDK中工作,并使用平台特定的config.xml文件作为源文件,你可以使用

trans-unit.source: element in index.html. For example, on Windows 10, you can include ms-appdata: in your
trans-unit.target: index.html中的元素。例如，在Windows 10上，您可以在您的计算机中包含 ms-appdata:

trans-unit.source: element to specify configuration that should only appear in a single platform-specific config.xml file.
trans-unit.target: 元素来指定只应出现在单个平台特定的config.xml文件中的配置。

trans-unit.source: events cancelable property is set to true in Chrome. This is contrary to the specification.
trans-unit.target: 在Chrome中将事件 cancelable 属性设置为true。这与规范相反。

trans-unit.source: from Apple Developer Downloads, which requires registration as an Apple Developer.
trans-unit.target: 从Apple Developer Downloads下载，需要注册为Apple Developer。

trans-unit.source: from the App Store, available by searching for "Xcode" in the App Store application.
trans-unit.target: 从App Store中获得，可通过在App Store应用程序中搜索“ Xcode”来获得。

trans-unit.source: height of the popover (0 or not specified will use apple's default height).
trans-unit.target: popover的高度(0或未指定将使用苹果的默认高度)。

trans-unit.source: height, in pixels, of the screen element onto which to anchor the popover.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕元素的高度,以像素为单位,用于固定弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: iOS does not have a default audio recording application, so a simple user interface is provided.
trans-unit.target: iOS没有默认的录音应用,所以提供了一个简单的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: iOS only records to files of type .wav and .m4a and returns an error if the file name extension is not correct.
trans-unit.target: iOS仅记录到.wav和.m4a类型的文件，如果文件扩展名不正确，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: iOS stores localStorage data in a location that may be cleaned out by the OS when space is required.
trans-unit.target: iOS将 localStorage 数据存储在需要空间时可由OS清除的位置。

trans-unit.source: iOS-only options that specify popover location in iPad.
trans-unit.target: 只限iOS系统的选项,可在iPad中指定弹出位置。

trans-unit.source: iOS-only parameters that specify the anchor element location and arrow direction of the popover when selecting images from an iPad's library or album. Note that the size of the popover may change to adjust to the direction of the arrow and orientation of the screen. Make sure to account for orientation changes when specifying the anchor element location.
trans-unit.target: iOS专用参数,指定从iPad的库或相册中选择图片时,弹出框的锚元素位置和箭头方向。请注意,弹出框的大小可能会改变,以适应箭头方向和屏幕方向。在指定锚元素位置时,一定要考虑到方向变化。

trans-unit.source: images are not specific to a given device.
images are scaled to fill the available viewport (while maintaining the aspect ratio).
trans-unit.target: 图像被缩放以填充可用的视口(同时保持长宽比)。

trans-unit.source: npm retrieves the cordova-android platform from the git repository, adds it to the project and updates the package.json.
trans-unit.target: npm 从git存储库中检索 cordova-android 平台，将其添加到项目中并更新 package.json 。

trans-unit.source: npm retrieves the cordova-plugin-device plugin from the git repository, adds it to the project and updates the package.json.
trans-unit.target: npm 从git存储库中检索 cordova-plugin-device 插件，将其添加到项目中并更新 package.json 。

trans-unit.source: orientation is unlocked - all orientations are supported.
trans-unit.target: 方向被解锁--支持所有方向。
进度事件不会触发。例如，将不执行以下处理程序： javascript writer.onprogress = function() { /*commands*/ };
